name: py-ruamel-yaml-clib
description:
C version of reader, parser and emitter for ruamel.yaml derived from
libyaml.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependent_to.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order
